  • public class Deck
extends CardPile

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ImageIcon CARDBACK 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      default constructor which creates a CardPile of 52 uniquely initialized Cards the default deck is ordered SPADES - CLUBS - HEARTS - DIAMONDS and from ACE to KING
      Deck(boolean shuffle)
      constructor that initializes a standard 52 Card deck and shuffles it

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CardPile buildDeck()
      initializes an ArrayList of a 52 Card deck and returns a new CardPile with those Cards outer loop iterates 4 times for each suit, inner iterates 13 for each rank.
      CardPile cut()
      removes half the deck and returns it
      static void main(String[] args) 
      void reshuffle()
      clears the Deck of any Cards, builds a new one, and shuffles
      void shuffle()
      shuffle's the CardPile's ArrayList simulating a deck shuffle

    • Method Detail

      • buildDeck

        public CardPile buildDeck()
        initializes an ArrayList of a 52 Card deck and returns a new CardPile with those Cards outer loop iterates 4 times for each suit, inner iterates 13 for each rank. SPADES - CLUBS - HEARTS - DIAMONDS and ACE - KING
        Returns:
        a new CardPile with a full deck

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        shuffle's the CardPile's ArrayList simulating a deck shuffle

      • reshuffle

        public void reshuffle()
        clears the Deck of any Cards, builds a new one, and shuffles

      • cut

        public CardPile cut()
        removes half the deck and returns it
        Returns:
        the top half of the deck

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
